headlines.description: — Clayton Keller scored 47 seconds into overtime to lift the Utah Mammoth to a 2-1 victory over the Buffalo Sabres on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Clayton Keller's overtime goal gives Mammoth 2-1 win over Sabres

headlines.description: — Bobby Brink scored twice, Trevor Zegras had the shootout winner and the Philadelphia Flyers beat the Montreal Canadiens 5-4 on Tuesday night after blowing a three-goal lead.
headlines.shortLinkText: Flyers beat Canadiens 4-3 in shootout after blowing 3-goal lead

events.name: Boston Bruins at New York Islanders

headlines.description: — Marat Khusnutdinov tied it late in the third period and had the lone shootout goal, helping the Boston Bruins beat the New York Islanders 4-3 on Tuesday night for their fourth straight victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Khusnutdinov scores tying goal in 3rd, adds lone shootout goal in Bruins' 4-3 win over Islanders

events.name: Carolina Hurricanes at New York Rangers

headlines.description: — Pyotr Kochetkov made 25 saves in his season debut, Nikolaj Ehlers, Sean Walker and Seth Jarvis scored and the Carolina Hurricanes beat the New York Rangers 3-0 on Tuesday night.

events.name: Tampa Bay Lightning at Colorado Avalanche

headlines.description: — Victor Olofsson scored twice, Scott Wedgewood made 22 saves for his NHL-leading eighth victory of the season and the Colorado Avalanche held off the Tampa Bay Lightning 3-2 on Tuesday night in a rematch of the 2022 Stanley Cup Finals.
headlines.shortLinkText: Olofsson, Wedgewood lead Avalanche past Lightning 3-2 in rematch of 2022 final

headlines.description: — Cutter Gauthier had his first career hat trick during a four-point performance, and the Anaheim Ducks routed the Florida Panthers 7-3 on Tuesday night for their fourth consecutive victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cutter Gauthier has 1st hat trick in 4-point night to send surging Ducks past Panthers, 7-3
